user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot displays a shopping cart with two items: an LG UltraGear 24" gaming monitor priced at $199.99 and a Batianda MacBook Pro 13 case priced at $19.80. The subtotal is $219.79, with an option to proceed to checkout. The user can choose to send the items as a gift and include a custom message. Additional options are available to delete or save the items for later, or compare them with similar products.
